title: Why Everybody Hates Eric Adams
description:
Eric Adams is the current mayor of NYC and arguably one of the worst mayors weâ€™ve ever had. This is a comprehensive overview of why everyone hates him, focusing on how he got elected, his devout commitment to NYPD and a police state, his war on the homeless, his resurrection of stop and frisk policies, exacerbation of the Rikers crisis and more!
